inclusion.criterion: proven and documented diagnosis of BE by high resolution computed tomography
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: stable pulmonary status as indicated by FEV1 (percent of predicted) ≥30%
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: spirometry revealed a forced expiratory volume in the first second (FEV1) of 60% of the predicted

inclusion.criterion: stable clinically phase (ie, subjects free from acute exacerbation for at least 6 weeks prior to the start of the study)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: stable regimen of standard treatment as chronic treatment for BE, at least for the past 4 weeks prior to screening. And/or macrolides if used as chronic treatment for BE at least for the past 6 months prior to screening
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: coughing on the majority of days for more than 8 weeks
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: ability to follow the inhaler device instructions
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: possible asthma according to the definition of the Global Initiative for Asthma (GINA)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: known intolerance for ICS or LABA
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: women who are pregnant, lactating, or in whom pregnancy cannot be excluded
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: expected to die within 72 hours after enrolment
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: cigarette smoking history of > 10 pack-years or current smokers
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: other cardiopulmonary conditions (other than bronchiectasis) that could modify spirometric values
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient has a history of asthma and is currently experiencing symptoms. He is being treated with corticosteroids and has a stable regimen of standard treatment.
